entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets or snow late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 near midnight then light before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
